In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. The third leg of the triumvirate, Sergey Brin , will take the title of Co-Founder, focusing on new products. "I like Mike Pence ," says former House Speaker Brad Ellsworth Gregg, a Democrat. He is a conservative, but unlike some conservatives he's not angry. I don't find him shaking his finger at a moderate or liberal. He invites discussion and an exchange of ideas.
